alert.note: Alert for Custer; Fall River (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 12 at 11:20PM MDT until August 13 at 12:15AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: The National Weather Service in Rapid City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Custer County in southwestern South Dakota... Northwestern Fall River County in southwestern South Dakota... * Until 1215 AM MDT. * At 1119 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 2 miles northwest of Argyle to 9 miles northeast of Burdock to Dewey, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Argyle and Burdock around 1125 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Cottonwood Springs Dam. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: These storms are producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows!
